properties.IndicatorDesc: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
properties.SERIES_Desc: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network
properties.SOURCE_DETAIL: Based on the data for the percentage of the population covered by a mobile network, broken down by technology, and on rural population figures, countries can produce estimates on rural and urban population coverage. ITU produces global estimates for the ru
